instructions: Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then go to Mail > Include Mail. Tap the accounts you want to see on your Apple Watch under Accounts. You can specify multiple accounts for example, iCloud and the account you use at work. If you want, tap specific mailboxes in an account to see their contents on your Apple Watch.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, tap Mail, tap an account, then turn on Show Alerts. Turn Sound and Haptic on or off.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, tap Mail, then tap Message Preview. Choose to show only 1 line, or none.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, tap Mail, tap Custom, then turn on Load Remote Images.
